WorkItem.Description:
The last 3 version I have used the Armour value has been off by about 1k points but all the other stats were spot on.  Today though, using leggings of the broken beast both the Armour and the hp are off. I tried refreshing both armory and wowhead but nothing changed. When I put back on the Malfurion's leg armor of conquest (sp) the all stats besides the Armour value are spot on again. 
 
Can you help identify both issues, the persistent Armour value being over valued and now this one leg Armor?  All else seems ok.
 
First time posting an issue so please let me know if I missed anything.
WorkItem.Summary: [Bear] Armor value off and possible HP

Comments.Message: It's probably because of your "Broken Heart" Trinket. RAWR averages out the armor proc from that trinket and adds it to your armor value. Also if you set the target level to 80, you should see values closer to what your seeing in-game.

Ok i can see the trinket being the issue for armour value TY!
The Hitpoints still off on the leg armour though.

Also forgive my noobish but what does setting my target level to 80 have to do with seeing values?  If i'm doing toc25 wouldnt i want to gear for level 83?

Because the values are different against a level 83 boss, the most significant of which are crit goes down by ~4.8%. All your avoidance stats go down a bit as well based on the DR formula (which is affected by target level)
